p: Subsequently, the new abietanes 19-oxo-inoroyleanol ( 61), 11,14-dihydroxy-12-methoxy-7-oxo-8,11,13-abietatrien-19,20 β-olide ( 62) and 19,20-epoxy-12-methoxy-11,14,19-trihydroxy-7-oxo-8,11,13-abietatriene ( 63), in addition to the known compounds inuroyleanol ( 23) and coulterone ( 64) were obtained from the roots of Gymneia platanifolia (Mart. ex Benth) Harley & J.F.B.Pastore (syn. Hyptis platanifolia Mart. ex. Benth.) ( Araújo et al., 2005). The isopimarane diterpene, salzol ( 65) was isolated from the leaves of Hypenia salzmannii (Benth.) Harley & J.F.B.Pastore (syn. Hyptis salzmannii Benth.), respectively ( Messana et al., 1990).
